On the way there, you felt a horrible cramping sensation in your bowels. Mexican food usually went straight through you, and this was no exception. You pushed, assuming it was just gas, but by the time you could feel the shit coming, it was too late. The cotton panties were instantly filled by a brown sludge, and this was punctuated by a violent fart, which sent liquid shit spraying into the face of the horrified human unlucky enough to be walking behind you. You could feel lots more coming, so you confidently strode into the nearest front yard. 

As you squatted over a flowerbed and pulled down your panties, you were unsure whether your waste would fertilize the garden or destroy it. Looking behind you, the mound of sludge from your panties already left a 2-foot high pile that entirely covered the delicate flowerbed, causing you to blush. 
"might as well finish what I started"
You mutter as you half stand before pushing hard on your bowls with an audible grunt. 

A cascade of sloppy, smooth shit erupts from your rear as you continue to grunt loudly. The sound of the flowing waste and farting eventually dies down as you finish. The front yard is littered with sloppy piles and puddles of your shit, and there are splatters all up the once-white walls. The sweatpants are ruined, so you throw them onto the driveway before once again squatting, on a clean patch of lawn to relieve yourself yet again, through your bladder this time.
125222.title: On the way there...

1252222.content:
Before you have a chance to clean yourself up you’re interrupted by the owner of the yard you just decimated. Embarrassed to bits you tense up and meet the ladies’ gaze, to your surprise she didn’t look too upset at all!

“I’ve been meaning to do some gardening but it looks like you got it covered for me huh? Come inside and get yourself cleaned up” the Fox lady teased, giving you time to calm down and pull up your pants you let yourself into the Foxes’ home.

The interior is very pristine and tidy much like the woman who made her way down the stairs. “Come on now, don’t be a stranger! The bathroom is the first door on the left.” The fox directed.

As you hastily make your way upstairs as not to break them under your weight you come across the bathroom door and head inside. Much to your surprise there’s no toilet? only a bed with the Fox perched on top. You apologize for intruding and begin to head out when the lady stops you.

“Silly girl, this is the restroom! the toilet is right here” the Fox points to her stomach and it clicks in your head, she wants to eat your shit! Who were you to deny either! You climb your way into the bed and lower your sweatpants and panties, revealing your dirty hole to the Fox.

Purring as the pungent odor fills the room when you spread your ass the Fox wastes no time going straight for the dried shit caked to the sides of each cheek. Returning the favor you shart point blank into the foxes face.

About 50 minutes pass of dirty rimming go by before you realize what time it is, you’ve got to be going soon! Before you run off the fox hands you a slip of paper you look on the back and it’s her phone number. “Score.” You say to yourself before running out the door
